claim_summary: A November 18, 2024 news release from the Arkansas Rural Health Partnership reports that the organization received a five-year $2 million grant from the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration (SAMHSA) to expand peer recovery services in collaboration with Adult Treatment Drug Courts in rural Arkansas【169420258121405†L42-L74】.

source.title: ARHP receives $2M from SAMHSA to Expand Peer Recovery Services to Support Adult Treatment Drug Courts
